GET /api/topics: A GET request that returns all topics
POST /api/topics: A POST request which adds a post to the topics
GET /api/articles: A GET request that returns all articles
POST /api/articles: A POST request which adds a post to the articles
GET /api/articles/:article_id: A GET request that returns a article by its id when passed an article_id
PATCH /api/articles/:article_id: PATCH updates a specified article by its id when passed an article_id
DELETE /api/articles/:article_id: DELETE deletes an article by its id when passed an article_id
GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: GET returns all comments from an article by the article_id when passed an article_id
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: POST creates a new comment for an article defined by its article_id
PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id: PATCH updates a comment by its comment id when passed a comment_id
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: DELETE deletes a comment by its id when  passed its comment_id
POST /api/users: POST creates a new user to the users table
GET /api/users/:username: GET returns a user by its username
GET /api: GET api, returns all the endpoints created on the api router
